CORONA_PROTECTION_SUBTITLE: Book Your Flights NOW with Peace of Mind!
CORONA_PROTECTION_TEXT_1: In these unprecedented times, we have taken all the risk out of your future travel planning. Book your vacation NOW knowing your fare is fully protected! If you’re concerned about flight restrictions or cancellations due to the pandemic situation, this policy will keep you worry free.
CORONA_PROTECTION_TEXT_2: The Sky-tours Coronavirus Protection Guarantee is valid for bookings starting now until further notice, and is valid for 365 days from the date of your booking (not valid for partially used ticket). This protection includes:
CORONA_PROTECTION_OPTION_0_1: You may change your destination if the flight to your original destination is canceled or the travel restriction at the destination do not allow you travel.
CORONA_PROTECTION_OPTION_1_1: You may change your departure airport to reach your original destination , if your schedule flight do not operate or the travel restrictions do not allow you to travel.
CORONA_PROTECTION_OPTION_2_1: You may change your date should the flight on the booked dates is canceled.
CORONA_PROTECTION_OPTION_3: FREE airline or airline combination change
CORONA_PROTECTION_OPTION_3_1: You may change to another airline if the flight with your original airline is canceled and they do not operate until the validity of your tickets.
CORONA_PROTECTION_OPTION_4_1: You may change your route if the original route booked is no longer possible.
CORONA_PROTECTION_OPTION_5_1: We will contact the carrier(s) on your behalf and recover any available refund. We will then return the full refundable amount to you. Please realize that refunds are subject to regulations and policies of carriers. If the carrier does not adhere, we will take action on your behalf. This refund assistance is free of charge for all travelers who book with the Sky-tours Coronavirus Protection Guarantee. All other travelers will be charged a non-refundable fee of US$25.00 (20€). The refund is calculated over the base fare of the ticket, insurance amount and original ticketing fees are non-refundable at anytime
CORONA_PROTECTION_TEXT_3: Take advantage of these low fares with no risk. Plan your trip now and be assured that you can postpone travel anytime within the next 365 days.
CORONA_PROTECTION_BOOK_NOW: Book NOW with Peace of Mind at historically LOW prices!
IMPORTANT_NOTICE_HEADER:
Travel Alert - Coronavirus-19: For all requests regarding a change or cancellation for US travel, please contact us using this Contact Form. We will reply to all requests within 24-48 hours. Our chat is temporarily disabled due to the unusual high volume of requests.
We are helping passengers with imminent travel first. If your trip is not within a 72 hour window, please wait to call our customer service department if possible. For additional steps that you can take now: Find out more
FLIGHT_REQUEST_PAGE_SUBTITLE: fill out the form and we'll do the rest
FLIGHT_REQUEST_LINK: Let us help you get home! Click here if you are stranded outside of your home country.
FLIGHT_REQUEST_TITLE: Let our team help get you home!
FLIGHT_REQUEST_TEXT:
1. Fill out our form.

2. Enter your credit card. You will ONLY be charged a fee of EUR 25/US$ 30 if we successfully find a flight.

3. Our worldwide customer support team is working around the clock to help our customers with possible alternatives.

4. If we find a flight, we will offer you one or more to choose from. Should you decline all of our suggestions, we will keep the non-refundable service fee.
CHOOSE_SUPPORT_PACKAGE: Choose the customer support package which is best for you!
UPSELL_SUPPORT_1: Do you want a better support from us?
UPSELL_SUPPORT_2: With only ---- per person you can have:
SEE_SUPPORT: Let me see my support options again…
CALL_AGENTS:
Please contact our Travel Agents at 1-833-422-3438 to continue with booking process.

If you are a travel agent please sign-in or sign-up to be able to book.
